name: CHHapticEngine.StoppedReason
desc: The enumeration of reasons the haptic engine stopped running.

items.name: case audioSessionInterrupt
items.desc: The system interrupted the audio session.

items.name: case gameControllerDisconnect
items.desc: The engine stopped because the associated game controller disconnected from the device.

items.name: case idleTimeout
items.desc: The engine shut down because you’ve enabled automatic shutdown, and the engine reached its idle timeout.

items.name: case notifyWhenFinished
items.desc: You’ve asked the system to notify you when it shuts down the engine.

items.name: case systemError
items.desc: A system error stopped the engine.
